GetImage.description: DIMAGE [Client] Returns the image loaded in the image panel.

GetImageColor.description: DIMAGE [Client] Returns the color override of the image panel.

PaintAt.description:
DIMAGE [Client] Paints a ghost copy of the DImage panel at the given position and dimensions. This function overrides Panel:PaintAt.

[number] posX
  The x coordinate to draw the panel from.

[number] posY
  The y coordinate to draw the panel from.

[number] width
  The width of the panel image to be drawn.

[number] height
  The height of the panel image to be drawn.

SetImage.description:
DIMAGE [Client] Sets the image to load into the frame. If the first image can't be loaded and strBackup is set, that image will be loaded instead. This eventually calls DImage:SetMaterial.

[string] strImage
  The path of the image to load. When no file extension is supplied the VMT file extension is used.

[string] strBackup
  The path of the backup image.

SetImageColor.description:
DIMAGE [Client] Sets the image's color override.

[table] col
  The color override of the image. Uses the Color structure.

SetKeepAspect.description:
DIMAGE [Client] 

[boolean] keep
  true to keep the aspect ratio, false not to

SetMaterial.description:
DIMAGE [Client] 

[IMaterial] mat
  The material to set
